title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 4500 - Account Wagering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 4500 - Account Wagering

State Regulations
§ 4500.1 - Definitions and general provisions
§ 4500.2 - Licensing account wagering
§ 4500.3 - Multi-jurisdictional account wagering providers; additional provisions
§ 4500.4 - Establishment of an account
§ 4500.5 - Official address
§ 4500.6 - Changes to account information
§ 4500.7 - Right to refuse an account
§ 4500.8 - Segregation of funds
§ 4500.9 - Conduct of wagering
§ 4500.10 - Record of wager; pari-mutuel tickets
§ 4500.11 - Withdrawals and other debits to accounts
§ 4500.12 - Credits to accounts
§ 4500.13 - Account statements
§ 4500.14 - Recordkeeping
§ 4500.15 - Confidentiality of accounts
§ 4500.16 - Closing of accounts
§ 4500.17 - Dormant accounts
§ 4500.18 - Surcharge
§ 4500.19 - Vouchers
§ 4500.20 - Reports to commission
§ 4500.21 - Yearly audit
§ 4500.22 - Disputes, complaints and adjustments
§ 4500.23 - Cooperation with officials

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 4500

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128, 222, 227, 301, 305, 401, 405, 518, 520, 1002, 1012

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
